sentences.sContent: The little boy made no effort to obey.
‘Sit!’ he said, and the dog obeyed him instantly.
sentences.sCn: “坐下！”他说道，那只狗马上就服从了。

sentences.sContent: ...Big fast food chains in New York City have started to obey a first of its kind rule...

remMethod.val: “耳背” → 无法听从 → 顺从， 服从

trans.tranOther: to do what someone in authority tells you to do, or what a law or rule says you must do
to do what someone in authority tells you to do, or what a law or rule says you must do
